Author: $username Course: CMIS 242 6383 Project Name: Project 1 (Employee Salary) Filename: $file.fileName Updated: $today Description: This program loads information about employees from a " " delimited text file. It then sorts and displays that information in the console. Finally, it calculates and displays the average salaries for each year.
